sentence.Network_en: " That's coffee candy to cajole children with,'said Hsin - mei , suddenly understanding.
sentence.Network_cn: 辛楣 恍然大悟道: “ 这是哄小孩子的咖啡方糖——”

sentence.Network_en: He would go to him - threaten, cajole, actually destroy him, if necessary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要去看他 —— 威胁 、 利诱 、 倘使需要的话, 就把他彻头彻尾地毁灭.

sentence.Network_en: They tried to cajole their daughter out of marrying him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们试图用甜言蜜语诱使女儿打消跟他结婚的念头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... cadge ? v. 行乞，乞求 cajole ? v. 哄骗 calcify ? vi. 钙化.
黄宝书3天背完GRE单词1 - 豆丁网 ... cede：vt. 放弃 cajole:vt. 以甜言蜜语哄骗,勾引 dolorous:adj. 忧伤的,悲痛的.
caisson n. 弹药箱;炸药箱cajole v. 骗取;劝诱cake n. 饼;糕饼 nv. 结块

list.abs: He cajoled his friends into deciding in his favor ., 他哄骗他的朋友做出对他有利的决定.
That big boy is always cajoling other children into doing things for him ., 那个大男孩老是哄骗别的孩子为他做事.
I am not going to cajole you into the reception of my view ., 我并不是要哄你接受我的观点.
I cajoled the avid entrepreneur the business for me .我引诱那个热心的企业家为我做生意。

entry.def: If you cajole someone into doing something, you get them to do it after persuading them for some time.

example.ex: It was he who had cajoled Garland into doing the film...
example.tran: 是他劝服嘉兰拍这部片子的。

example.ex: He cajoled Mr Dobson to stand for mayor.
example.tran: 他说服多布森先生竞选市长。

means.word_mean: 1. influence or urge by gentle urging, caressing, or flattering;

auth_sentence.content: He can inspire and cajole but also irritate and berate.
auth_sentence.res_content: He can inspire and cajole but also irritate and berate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He can inspire and cajole but also irritate and berate.

auth_sentence.content: Congressional leaders cajole, buttonhole, reward, punish and pray.
auth_sentence.res_content: Congressional leaders cajole, buttonhole, reward, punish and pray.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Congressional leaders cajole, buttonhole, reward, punish and pray.

auth_sentence.content: We tried to cajole him to write with s10 p. 1,000 for bait.
auth_sentence.res_content: We tried to cajole him to write with s10 p. 1,000 for bait.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We tried to cajole him to write with s10 p. 1,000 for bait.

means.word_mean: (用甜言蜜语、虚假诺言等)劝诱,哄骗

sentences.en: The little girl cajoled her father into buying her a new dress.
sentences.cn: 这小姑娘哄得她爸爸给她买了一件新衣服。
